title: Zeit Trends Can't Jump 3/3: Endemic, Poeltl, Tom Hanks, Trash Food, Kytch, Jack Harlow
itunes:title: Zeit Trends Can't Jump 3/3: Endemic, Poeltl, Tom Hanks, Trash Food, Kytch, Jack Harlow
description:
In this edition of Zeit Trends Can't Jump, Jack and Miles discuss the endemic phase of COVID, the new NBA player guessing game 'Poeltl', Tom Hanks appearing on 'Dead Eyes', trash foods they used to eat as children, Kytch suing McDonalds for $900 million, and the incipient remake of 'White Men Can't Jump' starring Jack Harlow!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
